scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install || echo 'Mobile not ready'
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.fix:lock: cd apps/web && rm -r -fo node_modules/.cache && cd ../api && rm -r -fo node_modules/.cache && cd ../..
